item.title: 'I'm here to entertain' - Alcaraz books semi-final spot
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz reaches the US Open semi-finals for the third time after comprehensive straight-set win against Jiri Lehecka.

item.title: Details emerge in deadly door-knock prank shooting in Houston
item.description: Gonzalo Leon Jr., 42, has been charged with the murder of an 11-year-old after the boy knocked on his door and ran away.
